2.3.2 Special escape sequences:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\s*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Empty line is required between sections.'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='CustomImportOrder'>
        <property name='customImportOrder' value='STATIC###STANDARD'/>
        <property name='sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically' value='true'/>
        <property name='separateLineBetweenGroups' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3.4.1 Exactly one top-level class declar:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OuterTypeFilename'>
        <property name='severity' value='error'/>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z].*\\.java$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Outer type name and file name must match, and the file name must start with an uppercase letter.'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.2 Nonempty blocks: K & R style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowSingleLineBlocks' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_NEW, LITERAL_CLASS, LITERAL_INTERFACE, LITERAL_ENUM, LITERAL_ANNOTATION, LITERAL_RECORD'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.3 Empty blocks: may be concise:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='EmptyBlock'>
        <property name='option' value='text'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE'/>
        <property name='option' value='allowSingleLineStatement'/>
    </module>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='2'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='2'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='2'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='2'/>
    </module>"
}
4.3 One statement per line:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OneStatementPerLine'>
        <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowSingleLineBlocks' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, SEMI, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, LABELED_STAT, CASE_GROUP, LITERAL_CATCH, RESOURCE_SPECIFICATION, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_ASSERT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.1 Vertical Whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.6.2 Horizontal whitespace:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='allowEmptyConstructors' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterBinaryOperator' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterCast' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterColon' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterComma' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterMethodAnnotation' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterOpenBracket' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceAfterTypeAnnotation' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceBeforeBinaryOperator' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceBeforeCloseBracket' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceBeforeColon' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceBeforeComma' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceBeforeOpenBracket' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowWhitespaceBeforeTypeAnnotation' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR, BOR_ASSIGN, COLON, COMMA, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, LOR, LT, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, QUESTION, SL, SLIST, SL_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, TYPE_PARAMETER, TYPE_UPPER_BOUND'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.7 Modifiers:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='ModifierOrder'>
        <property name='tokens' value='PUBLIC, PROTECTED, PRIVATE, ABSTRACT, DEFAULT, STATIC, FINAL, TRANSIENT, VOLATILE, SYNCHRONIZED, NATIVE, STRICTFP'/>
    </module>"
}
5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\w+$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Identifier does not match the regular expression \\\w+'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.1 Package names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='PackageName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+(\\.[a-z0-9]+)*$'/>
        <property name='illegalFormat' value='^[a-z]+(_[a-z0-9]+)*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Package name must use only lowercase letters and digits, with consecutive words concatenated'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.2 Class names:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='TypeName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='allowInterface' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowAnnotationType' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowTestSuffix' value='Test'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.5 Non-constant field names:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='MemberName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='ignoreModifiers' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreStatic' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
5.2.7 Local variable names:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LocalVariableName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
        <property name='allowOneLetterAbbreviation' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}
5.3 Camel case: defined:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z]+([A-Z][a-z]*)*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Variable name must be in camelCase'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
        <property name='ignoreCase' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
7.2 The summary fragment:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='JavadocMethod'>
        <property name='scope' value='public'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadoc' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocReturn' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocThrows' value='false'/>
        <property name='allowMissingJavadocType' value='false'/>
        <property name='checkFirstSentence' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='METHOD_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.5.1 Type-use annotations:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AnnotationLocation'>
        <property name='id' value='annotationLocation'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF'/>
        <property name='target' value='TYPE_USE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.8.4.2 Fall-through: commented:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='FallThrough'>
        <property name='checkLast' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CASE_GROUP'/>
        <property name='commentFormat' value='fall through'/>
    </module>"
}
